name: Noble Biocare Holdings AG
description: Noble Biocare Holdings AG is a leading provider of dental implants and restorative dentistry solutions. Founded in 2002 and headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland, the company specializes in developing and manufacturing innovative products that improve dental health and enhance the quality of life for patients worldwide. Noble Biocare's product portfolio includes a wide range of dental implants, prosthetic components, and digital solutions for dental professionals. The company is recognized for its commitment to research and development, providing cutting-edge technologies that help dentists deliver optimal treatments for their patients. With a global presence in over 70 countries, Noble Biocare partners with dental professionals to offer training, education, and support, ensuring high standards of care. The company’s mission is to provide solutions that enable dental professionals to achieve the best possible outcomes for their patients, ultimately contributing to a healthier society. Through its innovative approach and dedication to quality, Noble Biocare continues to lead the dental implant industry while focusing on enhancing patient care and advancing the field of restorative dentistry.
ceo: Jérôme A. P. L. H. F. D. de Smet

key_executives.name: Jérôme A. P. L. H. F. D. de Smet
